title: My Club disappeared
body: Hello! Since that bug with the clubs, that Riot was trying to solve, my club "Azorean Potterheads", in which I was the leader, disappeared. I asked some friends to see if the club still existed. They told me that it exists and that I'm still the owner of it. The question here is that I go to my Club section and I dont have any club. Can someone help me with it?

replies.body: Same here, still waiting for the fix since last month.
Happy to take a look!  Can you tell me the name/tag of the club?
The club name is Jane and Finch, and the tag is [J&F].
Looked into this, but it doesn't look like you're the club owner.  Aside from that, everything looks okay.
I'm the club owner, I used to go with the name Darth Perses. Here is the screenshot http://imgur.com/a/xVeFt
Aha...I was looking at Jane and Finch, not Jane & Finch.  Booped!  Can you relog and check again for me?  :D

Hey uhm, I am having the same problem right now. Can you help please? The club name is Estel. And the Club Tag is Estel too. The owner is sol i med karam (me) but its not showing it on my profile. But from my other profile Liakhim EverLion it shows that I in fact am. Can i get some help too?

Hi I have the same problem,
The club name: TRM
The club Tag : RAIN
My ingame name : TRANCETHERAPY
Region EUW

Thanks !
same problem, my club name is foever16 tag is QoQ16. my friend told me i'm still the owner but I can't see that on my account
I took a look into this and everything looks okay now, at least to me.  Can you re-log and let me know if everything is okay now?
Thanks man. You solved it!!! Now everything is okay.
